original: rnal 'byor pa ka ma la sh'i las rang gi de kho na nyid kyi ye shes gnyug ma'i don de rtogs shing khod du chud pa la gdeng thob cing /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ka ma la sh'i las rang gi de kho na nyid kyi ye shes gnyug ma'i don de rtogs shing khod du chud pa la gdeng thob cing /

original: nyams kyi rtsal phyogs med du shar ba'i stobs kyis gnyis med kyi ye shes chen po de mtshon pa tshig gi rta la bskyon te tshogs kyi gral du mgur bzhengs pa las /
analyzed: nyams kyi rtsal phyogs med du shar ba'i stobs kyis gnyis med kyi ye shes chen po de mtshon pa tshig gi rta la bskyon te tshogs kyi gral du mgur bzhengs pa las /
translated: By the power of the boundless arising of the strength of experience, he mounted the horse of words that illustrate the great nondual wisdom and sang this song in the row of the ga·πáacakra:

original: ye shes dang las las grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgyes te mdun gyi nam mkha' la sprin gyi phung po bzhin du gtibs nas /
analyzed: ye shes dang las las grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgyes te mdun gyi nam mkha' la sprin gyi phung po bzhin du gtibs nas /
translated: The dakinis of wisdom and action were delighted and gathered in the sky in front like a mass of clouds.

original: rnal 'byor pa la snying gtam gsang tshig tu sbran te mgur bzhengs pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa la snying gtam gsang tshig tu sbran te mgur bzhengs pa /
translated: They gave this secret advice as a heart-advice song to the yogi:

original: kye ho stobs ldan rigs kyi bu //
analyzed: kye ho stobs ldan rigs kyi bu //
translated: Kye ho! Powerful son of noble family!

original: yang dag don grub rdo rje'i rtsal //
analyzed: yang dag don grub rdo rje'i rtsal //
translated: You are the one who accomplishes the genuine truth, the vajra-skilled one!

original: sbyangs pa'i las sad skal ba can //
analyzed: sbyangs pa'i las sad skal ba can //
translated: You have the karma of training and are so fortunate!üîΩYou are the lord of qualities, the master of treasures,

original: yon tan dbang phyug gter gyi bdag / dngos grub gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i lus //
analyzed: yon tan dbang phyug gter gyi bdag / dngos grub gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i lus //
translated: Your body is adorned with the two types of siddhis.

original: mi yi khyu mchog tshogs kyi rje //
analyzed: mi yi khyu mchog tshogs kyi rje //
translated: You are the best of men, the lord of the assembly.

original: khyod rgyu yi chos nyid rkyen gyis gsos //
analyzed: khyod rgyu yi chos nyid rkyen gyis gsos //
translated: You are the one who heals the dharmata of causes with conditions.

original: sbyangs pa'i las 'phro dum bur 'thung //
analyzed: sbyangs pa'i las 'phro dum bur 'thung //
translated: You are the one who drinks the nectar of the karma of training.

original: yon tan yid bzhin nor bu brnyes //
analyzed: yon tan yid bzhin nor bu brnyes //
translated: You are the one who finds the wish-fulfilling jewel of qualities.

original: 'od gsal chen po'i mdangs la gnas //
analyzed: 'od gsal chen po'i mdangs la gnas //
translated: You are the one who abides in the radiance of great luminosity.

original: sgyu ma tsam du 'gro don mdzad //
analyzed: sgyu ma tsam du 'gro don mdzad //
translated: You are the one who benefits beings in a mere illusory way.

original: dpe med nam mkha'i rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: dpe med nam mkha'i rnal 'byor pa //
translated: You are the yogi of the space that is beyond example.

original: khyod la bskul ba mi 'tshal gyis //
analyzed: khyod la bskul ba mi 'tshal gyis //
translated: You do not need to be encouraged.

original: 'on kyang nged kyi glu la nyon //
analyzed: 'on kyang nged kyi glu la nyon //
translated: However, listen to our song.

original: spyir skye 'gro sems can las kyis 'khrul //
analyzed: spyir skye 'gro sems can las kyis 'khrul //
translated: In general, sentient beings are deluded by karma.

original: sdug bsngal gyi gnas na longs spyod byed //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi gnas na longs spyod byed //
translated: They enjoy themselves in the abode of suffering.

original: 'di ma bzod brtse bas sha la bab /
analyzed: 'di ma bzod brtse bas sha la bab /
translated: I cannot bear this; compassion falls upon the flesh.

original: da khyod kyi thugs rjes mi dgongs na //
analyzed: da khyod kyi thugs rjes mi dgongs na //
translated: Now, if you do not think of them with compassion,

original: 'gro drug gi pha ma ji ltar byed //
analyzed: 'gro drug gi pha ma ji ltar byed //
translated: How will you act toward the parents of the six beings?

original: khyed phan sems skyed cig rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: khyed phan sems skyed cig rnal 'byor pa //
translated: You yogis should generate the altruistic intention!

original: lar rig pa'i khye'u chung yengs la dga' //
analyzed: lar rig pa'i khye'u chung yengs la dga' //
translated: In general, the child of awareness delights in distraction.

original: 'khrul pa'i snang ba ltad mo che //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i snang ba ltad mo che //
translated: Deluded appearances are a great spectacle.

original: gzung 'dzin rkun ma mgo lo rgod //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin rkun ma mgo lo rgod //
translated: The thieves of percepts and perceivers are wild and unruly.

original: yid gnyis kyi shes @88b pa tsam tsom mang //
analyzed: yid gnyis kyi shes @88b pa tsam tsom mang //
translated: There is just a bit of the uncertainty of dualistic mind.

original: gnyen po'i mel tshe snying rus chung //
analyzed: gnyen po'i mel tshe snying rus chung //
translated: The watchman of the antidote has little perseverance.

original: shes bzhin gyi dran pa sgo cha lhod //
analyzed: shes bzhin gyi dran pa sgo cha lhod //
translated: The door of mindfulness of alertness is relaxed.

original: sems nyid kyi nor bu 'chor nyen yod //
analyzed: sems nyid kyi nor bu 'chor nyen yod //
translated: There is a danger of losing the jewel of mind itself.

original: khyod yul la ma yengs rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: khyod yul la ma yengs rnal 'byor pa //
translated: You yogis who are not distracted by objects,

original: gzhi 'gyur med nam mkha'i btsun mo la //üîΩnyon mongs dug lnga'i khong sran zhugs //
analyzed: gzhi 'gyur med nam mkha'i btsun mo la // nyon mongs dug lnga'i khong sran zhugs //
translated: In the queen of unchanging space, the ground,üîΩThe five poisons of affliction are planted as seeds.

original: gzung 'dzin gyi 'gong po spun dgu gnod //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin gyi 'gong po spun dgu gnod //
translated: The nine siblings of the demon of percepts and perceivers cause harm.

original: bzang ngan rkyen rtog gi 'khrul phyir 'brang //
analyzed: bzang ngan rkyen rtog gi 'khrul phyir 'brang //
translated: You follow after the confusion of good and bad thoughts.

original: chags sdang gi spyod lam ma legs pas //
analyzed: chags sdang gi spyod lam ma legs pas //
translated: With your improper conduct of attachment and aversion,

original: gzung 'dzin gyi nad ro gting nas bslang //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin gyi nad ro gting nas bslang //
translated: You‚Äôve stirred up from the depths the sickness of perceiver and perceived.

original: rang lus kyi bde ba stor nas 'dug /'khrul pa'i sems can snying re rje //
analyzed: rang lus kyi bde ba stor nas 'dug /'khrul pa'i sems can snying re rje //
translated: You‚Äôve lost the bliss of your own body‚Äîhow sad, deluded beings!

original: khyod 'gro don gyis shig rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: khyod 'gro don gyis shig rnal 'byor pa //
translated: You yogis should benefit beings!

original: lar yid kyi ye shes co lu chung //
analyzed: lar yid kyi ye shes co lu chung //
translated: The wisdom of the mind is a small child;

original: sgo lnga'i brdzun la nyan nyan nas //
analyzed: sgo lnga'i brdzun la nyan nyan nas //
translated: Listening to the lies of the five senses,

original: rigs drug g-yang la bskyur nyen gda' //
analyzed: rigs drug g-yang la bskyur nyen gda' //
translated: There‚Äôs the danger you‚Äôll be cast off the cliff of the six kinds of beings.

original: khyod gnyis 'dzin shig cig rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: khyod gnyis 'dzin shig cig rnal 'byor pa //
translated: You yogis should hold to nonduality!

original: 'gyu byed kyi dran rtog blo rgod po //
analyzed: 'gyu byed kyi dran rtog blo rgod po //
translated: The wild mind of thoughts and memories

original: kun gzhi dbyings kyi pho brang du //
analyzed: kun gzhi dbyings kyi pho brang du //
translated: In the palace of the space of the all-base,

original: ma bcos car nyal mi byed par //üîΩ'dod yon sgyu ma'i slu brid la //
analyzed: ma bcos car nyal mi byed par // 'dod yon sgyu ma'i slu brid la //
translated: You don‚Äôt rest in unfabricated freshness.üîΩYou play with the five poisons

original: dug lnga'i grogs dang 'grogs nas rtse //
analyzed: dug lnga'i grogs dang 'grogs nas rtse //
translated: As friends in the deception of illusory sense pleasures.

original: yul chags sdang gnyis la yengs pa yis //
analyzed: yul chags sdang gnyis la yengs pa yis //
translated: Distracted by attachment and aversion to objects,

original: ngan 'gro'i g-yang du ldud nyen yod //
analyzed: ngan 'gro'i g-yang du ldud nyen yod //
translated: There‚Äôs the danger you‚Äôll be cast into the abyss of the lower realms.

original: dbang po sgo lnga'i sgo sdoms la //
analyzed: dbang po sgo lnga'i sgo sdoms la //
translated: You should block the doors of the five senses!

original: yid kyi khye'u chud btson du zung //
analyzed: yid kyi khye'u chud btson du zung //
translated: Hold the child of mind in the prison.

original: bde gsal stong pa'i mal du snyol //
analyzed: bde gsal stong pa'i mal du snyol //
translated: Go to sleep on the bed of bliss, clarity, and emptiness.

original: khyed yengs su 'gro'o rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: khyed yengs su 'gro'o rnal 'byor pa //
translated: You who are distracted, you yogis,

original: skye rgan 'chi'i chu bo la //
analyzed: skye rgan 'chi'i chu bo la //
translated: In the river of birth, old age, and death,

original: rkyal med kyi blun po rtse la dga' //
analyzed: rkyal med kyi blun po rtse la dga' //
translated: The fool without a raft delights in play.

original: dal 'byor gyi gru bo yod bzhin du //
analyzed: dal 'byor gyi gru bo yod bzhin du //
translated: While you have the boat of leisure and opportunity,

original: rje bla ma'i gnyen pa mi bsten par //
analyzed: rje bla ma'i gnyen pa mi bsten par //
translated: Not relying on the friend of the lord guru,

original: las mi dge'i rba la gtam col byed //
analyzed: las mi dge'i rba la gtam col byed //
translated: You will be carried away by the waves of nonvirtue.

original: sdug bsngal gyi rba la gnyen pos byol //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi rba la gnyen pos byol //
translated: You will be carried away by the waves of suffering.

original: zhen chags kyi 'dam la ma lus par //
analyzed: zhen chags kyi 'dam la ma lus par //
translated: Without getting stuck in the swamp of attachment,

original: thar ba'i skam sar ci snyogs kyis //
analyzed: thar ba'i skam sar ci snyogs kyis //
translated: Strive to reach the dry land of liberation.

original: khyod zhe 'dod thang cig rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: khyod zhe 'dod thang cig rnal 'byor pa //
translated: You who have desires, you yogis,

original: 'dod pa dug gi sdong po la //
analyzed: 'dod pa dug gi sdong po la //
translated: On the trunk of the poisonous tree of desire,

original: spang blang gnyis kyi ya la ga gyes //
analyzed: spang blang gnyis kyi ya la ga gyes //
translated: What are you doing with the two branches of adopting and rejecting?

original: zhen pa'i lo 'dab phyogs bcur rgyas //
analyzed: zhen pa'i lo 'dab phyogs bcur rgyas //
translated: The leaves of attachment spread in the ten directions.

original: rtsol sgrub kyi me tog mkha' la 'phur//
analyzed: rtsol sgrub kyi me tog mkha' la 'phur//
translated: The flowers of effort and achievement fly into the sky.

original: sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu thur la brul //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu thur la brul //
translated: The fruit of suffering falls to the ground.

original: snying med kyi spre'u bsgugs kyi za //
analyzed: snying med kyi spre'u bsgugs kyi za //
translated: The heartless monkey waits for it to fall.

original: 'khor ba'i nags su 'chi nyen yod //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i nags su 'chi nyen yod //
translated: In the forest of samsara, there is the danger of death.

original: sna tshogs zhen med kyi skyes bu yis //
analyzed: sna tshogs zhen med kyi skyes bu yis //
translated: The person who is free of attachment to the various things

original: gdeng 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshon thogs te //
analyzed: gdeng 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshon thogs te //
translated: Takes up the weapon of unwavering confidence

original: 'dod pa'i sdong po rming nas bsgyel //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i sdong po rming nas bsgyel //
translated: And uproots the tree of desire from its very depths.

original: dug lnga'i 'bras bu sngo skams @89a * //
analyzed: dug lnga'i 'bras bu sngo skams @89a * //
translated: The fruit of the five poisons is withered and carried away.

original: khyer // dug 'chi byed kyi nus pa zad par gyis //
analyzed: khyer // dug 'chi byed kyi nus pa zad par gyis //
translated: The power of the poison that kills is exhausted.

original: khyod zhe 'dod spongs shig rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: khyod zhe 'dod spongs shig rnal 'byor pa //
translated: Abandon your ambitions, O yogi!

original: ri dgas sgra yis phung ba de //
analyzed: ri dgas sgra yis phung ba de //
translated: The deer who was destroyed by sound

original: snyan grags ched du bsgrubs pas lan //
analyzed: snyan grags ched du bsgrubs pas lan //
translated: Was destroyed because he was seeking fame.

original: bstod smad brag ca lta bu la //
analyzed: bstod smad brag ca lta bu la //
translated: Praise and blame are like an echo.

original: phyogs 'dzin ma byed rnal 'byor pa //üîΩglang chen lcags kyus zin pa de //
analyzed: phyogs 'dzin ma byed rnal 'byor pa // glang chen lcags kyus zin pa de //
translated: Don‚Äôt be biased, O yogi!üîΩThe elephant who was caught by the hook

original: rgun chang rol chags pas len //üîΩ'dod yon lan tshva'i chu rgod la //
analyzed: rgun chang rol chags pas len // 'dod yon lan tshva'i chu rgod la //
translated: Was caught because he was attached to the fermented grain beer.

original: zhen pa ma che rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: zhen pa ma che rnal 'byor pa //
translated: Don‚Äôt be attached to the salt water of sensory objects, O yogi!

original: rma bya gud nas shi ba de //
analyzed: rma bya gud nas shi ba de //
translated: The peacock who died in a trap

original: spu thog rgyan du mthong bas lan //üîΩ'byung bzhi mi gtsang phung po la //
analyzed: spu thog rgyan du mthong bas lan // 'byung bzhi mi gtsang phung po la //
translated: Was caught because he saw the feathers as an ornament.

original: rang mthong ma che rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: rang mthong ma che rnal 'byor pa //
translated: Don‚Äôt be proud of your own body, which is a heap of impure elements, O yogi!

original: sbrang ma 'dam du chud pa de//
analyzed: sbrang ma 'dam du chud pa de//
translated: The bee who got stuck in the mud

original: bzung can dri la chags pas lan //
analyzed: bzung can dri la chags pas lan //
translated: Is due to attachment to the smell of the captured prey.

original: nye du gnas skabs 'brel pa la //
analyzed: nye du gnas skabs 'brel pa la //
translated: In the case of relatives, the connection is temporary;

original: brtse gdung ma byed rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: brtse gdung ma byed rnal 'byor pa //
translated: Don‚Äôt be attached to them, O yogi!

original: phye le ba me yis tshig pa de //
analyzed: phye le ba me yis tshig pa de //
translated: The one who is burned by the fire of the furnace

original: zhun mar mdangs la chags pas lan //
analyzed: zhun mar mdangs la chags pas lan //
translated: Is due to attachment to the luster of the refined gold.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i yul snang la //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i yul snang la //
translated: In the case of illusory objects,

original: der 'dzin ma byed rnal 'byor ba //
analyzed: der 'dzin ma byed rnal 'byor ba //
translated: Don‚Äôt grasp at them, O yogi!

original: 'dab chags snyi la zin pa de //
analyzed: 'dab chags snyi la zin pa de //
translated: The bird caught in a snare

original: 'dod yon zas phyir 'brangs pas lan //üîΩzhen pa lcags kyu'i kha zas la //
analyzed: 'dod yon zas phyir 'brangs pas lan // zhen pa lcags kyu'i kha zas la //
translated: Is due to following after desirable objects for food.

original: ltogs 'dod ma byed rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: ltogs 'dod ma byed rnal 'byor pa //
translated: Don‚Äôt be greedy for food, O yogi!

original: kun gzhi dag pa'i me long la //
analyzed: kun gzhi dag pa'i me long la //
translated: The mirror of the pure ground of all

original: tshogs drug rig pa'i phyi bdar byas //
analyzed: tshogs drug rig pa'i phyi bdar byas //
translated: Is cleaned by the awareness of the six consciousnesses.

original: yul drug gsal ba'i gzugs brnyan shar //
analyzed: yul drug gsal ba'i gzugs brnyan shar //
translated: The clear reflections of the six objects arise;

original: ma rtogs byis pas dngos por gzung //
analyzed: ma rtogs byis pas dngos por gzung //
translated: The unenlightened childish ones grasp at them as real.

original: chags sdang gnyis kyi bde sdug myong //
analyzed: chags sdang gnyis kyi bde sdug myong //
translated: They experience happiness and suffering due to attachment and aversion.

original: kun gzhi ma bcos chos kyi dbyings //
analyzed: kun gzhi ma bcos chos kyi dbyings //
translated: The unfabricated ground of all is the dharmadhatu;

original: tshogs drug ma 'gags der 'dzin med //
analyzed: tshogs drug ma 'gags der 'dzin med //
translated: The six consciousnesses are unimpeded, free of grasping.

original: yul drug gsal la ngo bos stong //
analyzed: yul drug gsal la ngo bos stong //
translated: The six objects are clear, yet their essence is empty.

original: dngos 'dzin byis pa ga chad du //
analyzed: dngos 'dzin byis pa ga chad du //
translated: The childish ones who grasp at things as real

original: mkhas pa rang snang der 'dzin bral //
analyzed: mkhas pa rang snang der 'dzin bral //
translated: The wise one is free from clinging to his own appearances.

original: khyod der 'dzin shig cig rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: khyod der 'dzin shig cig rnal 'byor pa //
translated: You should cling to that, O yogi!

original: gzhi ngos gzung med pa'i nam mkha' la //
analyzed: gzhi ngos gzung med pa'i nam mkha' la //
translated: In the sky of the ground, which is not identified,

original: nyon mongs dug lnga'i lho sprin 'thibs //
analyzed: nyon mongs dug lnga'i lho sprin 'thibs //
translated: The southern clouds of the five poisons of affliction gather.

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'brug sgra bsgrags //
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'brug sgra bsgrags //
translated: The thunder of self-grasping resounds.

original: sna tshogs las kyi char rgyun phab //
analyzed: sna tshogs las kyi char rgyun phab //
translated: The rain of various karmas falls.

original: zhen chags 'khor ba'i 'dam rdzab g-yos //
analyzed: zhen chags 'khor ba'i 'dam rdzab g-yos //
translated: The swamp of samsara of attachment stirs.

original: 'gro drug sdug bsngal gyi rtsi thog rgyas //
analyzed: 'gro drug sdug bsngal gyi rtsi thog rgyas //
translated: The crop of the suffering of the six beings grows.

original: lhag mthong rig pa'i nyi ma yis //
analyzed: lhag mthong rig pa'i nyi ma yis //
translated: The sun of the awareness of vipashyana

original: dbyings kyi nyi ma gsal btab ste //
analyzed: dbyings kyi nyi ma gsal btab ste //
translated: Illuminates the sun of the dhatu.

original: mnyam rjes dran pa'i skyi ser gyis //
analyzed: mnyam rjes dran pa'i skyi ser gyis //
translated: The hail of mindfulness of meditation and postmeditation

original: dran rtog gi lho sprin dbyings su bdas //
analyzed: dran rtog gi lho sprin dbyings su bdas //
translated: Drives the southern clouds of thoughts into the dhatu.

original: bdag 'dzin gyi 'brug sgra rang sar yal //
analyzed: bdag 'dzin gyi 'brug sgra rang sar yal //
translated: The thunder of self-grasping vanishes into itself.

original: las kyi char rgyun rtsa ba bral //
analyzed: las kyi char rgyun rtsa ba bral //
translated: The rain of karma is cut off at the root.

original: zhan 'dzin gyi 'dam rdzab nyi mas bskams //
analyzed: zhan 'dzin gyi 'dam rdzab nyi mas bskams //
translated: The swamp of self-grasping is dried up by the sun.

original: @89b rigs drug gi sa bon skam la yang //
analyzed: @89b rigs drug gi sa bon skam la yang //
translated: The seeds of the six beings are dried up.

original: sdug bsngal gyi lo tog sngo bskams khyer //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi lo tog sngo bskams khyer //
translated: The crop of suffering is dried up and carried away.

original: khyod the tshom ma byed rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: khyod the tshom ma byed rnal 'byor pa //
translated: You, yogi, do not have any doubts.

original: mtshan ldan gyi rgyal bu blon pos brkus //
analyzed: mtshan ldan gyi rgyal bu blon pos brkus //
translated: The qualified prince was stolen by the ministers.

original: bshes med kyi yul du sbrang drir 'khyams //
analyzed: bshes med kyi yul du sbrang drir 'khyams //
translated: He wandered in the land of no friends, in the honey of bees.

original: lhad dang hral hrul gyi 'tsho ba bsten //
analyzed: lhad dang hral hrul gyi 'tsho ba bsten //
translated: He relied on a life of deceit and fraud.

original: rang gzhan gnyis kas ngo ma shes //
analyzed: rang gzhan gnyis kas ngo ma shes //
translated: Neither he nor anyone else knew who he was.

original: mtshan mkhan gyi bram zes rigs brgyud rtogs //
analyzed: mtshan mkhan gyi bram zes rigs brgyud rtogs //
translated: The brahmin astrologer recognized his lineage.

original: blo gros blun po'i bu la dris //
analyzed: blo gros blun po'i bu la dris //
translated: He asked the son of a foolish man for his mind.

original: gnas lugs rig pa'i rje la gtad //
analyzed: gnas lugs rig pa'i rje la gtad //
translated: He was entrusted to the lord who knows the natural state.

original: tshogs gnyis dag pa'i khrus nas bton //
analyzed: tshogs gnyis dag pa'i khrus nas bton //
translated: He was pulled out of the bath of the two pure accumulations.

original: gdams pa yid bzhin nor bus brgyan //
analyzed: gdams pa yid bzhin nor bus brgyan //
translated: He was adorned with the wish-fulfilling jewel of instruction.

original: rtogs pa rin chen gyi khri la bzhag / dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi rgyal sa bzung //
analyzed: rtogs pa rin chen gyi khri la bzhag / dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi rgyal sa bzung //
translated: He was placed on the jeweled throne of realization and took the royal seat of the buddhas of the three times.

original: khyod bla ma bsten cig rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: khyod bla ma bsten cig rnal 'byor pa //
translated: You, yogi, rely on a guru.

original: rten med yid kyi ri dags nge //
analyzed: rten med yid kyi ri dags nge //
translated: The deer of the mind without a support

original: las dbang bar ngo'i thang la 'khyams //
analyzed: las dbang bar ngo'i thang la 'khyams //
translated: wanders in the plain of the power of karma.

original: zhen chags smig rgyu'i chu la gdungs //
analyzed: zhen chags smig rgyu'i chu la gdungs //
translated: It is tormented by the water of mirage of attachment.

original: rigs drug 'khor ba'i mtha' la shi //
analyzed: rigs drug 'khor ba'i mtha' la shi //
translated: It dies on the edge of samsara‚Äôs six realms.

original: ri lung sha khrag rjes kyis bkang //
analyzed: ri lung sha khrag rjes kyis bkang //
translated: The mountains and valleys are filled with its flesh and blood.

original: da rten med kyi rig pa mkha' la chings //
analyzed: da rten med kyi rig pa mkha' la chings //
translated: The awareness that has no support is embraced in space.

original: tshogs drug gi rkyen kha ma 'grim par //
analyzed: tshogs drug gi rkyen kha ma 'grim par //
translated: Without wandering into the conditions of the six sense groups,üîΩRun on the plain of great luminosity.

original: 'od gsal chen po'i thang la rgyug /'dod yon smig rgyu'i chu bo la //üîΩder 'dzin gyi zhen pa ma byed par //
analyzed: 'od gsal chen po'i thang la rgyug /'dod yon smig rgyu'i chu bo la // der 'dzin gyi zhen pa ma byed par //
translated: Without clinging to the water of the mirage of sense objects,

original: zhen 'dod kyi gdung ba nang du chod //
analyzed: zhen 'dod kyi gdung ba nang du chod //
translated: The inner torment of clinging and desire is cut off.

original: rigs drug gi rkyen kha ma 'grim par //
analyzed: rigs drug gi rkyen kha ma 'grim par //
translated: Without wandering into the conditions of the six types of beings,

original: mnyam nyid chen po'i dbyings su nyol //
analyzed: mnyam nyid chen po'i dbyings su nyol //
translated: Sleep in the space of great equality.

original: yid bsam du med pa'i gnyug ma la //
analyzed: yid bsam du med pa'i gnyug ma la //
translated: In the intrinsic nature of the inconceivable mind,

original: dran pa g-yeng med kyi mda' mkhan gyis //
analyzed: dran pa g-yeng med kyi mda' mkhan gyis //
translated: With the archer of undistracted mindfulness,

original: ma bcos gnyug ma'i ngo bor bsrang //
analyzed: ma bcos gnyug ma'i ngo bor bsrang //
translated: The unfabricated intrinsic nature is extended.

original: re dogs gnyis kyi mgo rtsa bregs //
analyzed: re dogs gnyis kyi mgo rtsa bregs //
translated: The head of the two, hope and fear, is cut off.

original: dga' bzhi'i bcas su dril nas kyang //
analyzed: dga' bzhi'i bcas su dril nas kyang //
translated: Having rolled it into the four joys,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i me d'u bcug /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i me d'u bcug /
translated: The connate arrow is inserted.

original: thabs shes rab gnyis kyi ltong btod de //
analyzed: thabs shes rab gnyis kyi ltong btod de //
translated: Having set the notch of the two, method and wisdom,

original: skad cig bzhi yi sgro bskyon nas //
analyzed: skad cig bzhi yi sgro bskyon nas //
translated: Having put on the fletches of the four moments,

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyogs su 'phangs //
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyogs su 'phangs //
translated: It is shot in the direction of the self-grasping.

original: gti mug phag rgod snying la gzer //
analyzed: gti mug phag rgod snying la gzer //
translated: The wild boar of delusion pierces the heart.

original: gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi srog rtsa bcad //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi srog rtsa bcad //
translated: Cut the life-force of the two, percept and perceiver.

original: 'khor ba'i gnas su da mi rgyu //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i gnas su da mi rgyu //
translated: Now do not wander in the abode of samsara.

original: khyod pa tsan sa zung shig rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: khyod pa tsan sa zung shig rnal 'byor pa //
translated: O yogi, you must hold on to it!

original: yul rang snang zhen med du shar ba'i tshe //
analyzed: yul rang snang zhen med du shar ba'i tshe //
translated: When the objects arise in self-appearance without attachment,

original: 'dod yon lam gyi grogs su 'gro //
analyzed: 'dod yon lam gyi grogs su 'gro //
translated: The sense pleasures become the friend of the path.

original: padma'i kha dog 'dam na gsal //
analyzed: padma'i kha dog 'dam na gsal //
translated: The color of the lotus is clear in the mud.

original: nyams gang dgar skyongs shig rnal 'byor ba //
analyzed: nyams gang dgar skyongs shig rnal 'byor ba //
translated: O yogi, you must sustain any experience that arises!

original: chos bden med khong du chud pa'i tshe //
analyzed: chos bden med khong du chud pa'i tshe //
translated: When you have realized the truth of phenomena to be unreal,

original: srog rtsol zung 'jug chen po yin //üîΩglang po'i gser sgrog blod na bde //
analyzed: srog rtsol zung 'jug chen po yin // glang po'i gser sgrog blod na bde //
translated: That is the great union of prana and mind.
When the golden chain of the elephant is loosened, it is happy.

original: rtsol zhog cig rnal 'byor ba //
analyzed: rtsol zhog cig rnal 'byor ba //
translated: O yogi, you must give up effort!

original: mnyam nyid rig pa'i rta pho de //
analyzed: mnyam nyid rig pa'i rta pho de //
translated: The stallion of awareness of equality

original: gzung 'dzin gyi sgrog tu ma chud par //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin gyi sgrog tu ma chud par //
translated: Is not caught in the chains of percepts and perceivers.

original: bdag gzhan du 'dzin pa'i sra ba kha glod //
analyzed: bdag gzhan du 'dzin pa'i sra ba kha glod //
translated: Loosen the tight grip of clinging to self and other.

original: phyogs med kyi thang la gar bder rgyug / nyams shugs byung du rdol ba'i smyon pa de //
analyzed: phyogs med kyi thang la gar bder rgyug / nyams shugs byung du rdol ba'i smyon pa de //
translated: The madman who bursts forth with the arising of experience

original: gnyen pos lcags su ma gzhug par //
analyzed: gnyen pos lcags su ma gzhug par //
translated: Is not put in the cage of antidotes.

original: tshul 'chos kyi khyim nas sgor phyung la //
analyzed: tshul 'chos kyi khyim nas sgor phyung la //
translated: Expel him from the house of hypocrisy.

original: gar bde'i gnas su yan du chug / rtog pa nam mkha'i khyung chen de //
analyzed: gar bde'i gnas su yan du chug / rtog pa nam mkha'i khyung chen de //
translated: The great garu·∏ça of thought,

original: grub mtha'i gzan la ma chags shing //
analyzed: grub mtha'i gzan la ma chags shing //
translated: Not attached to the food of tenets,

original: 'khrul pa'i g-yang la ma bred par //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i g-yang la ma bred par //
translated: Not frightened by the abyss of delusion,üîΩLet it soar in the sky without direction.

original: phyogs med kyi mkha' la lding du chug /'bras bu yid bzhin gyi nor bu de //
analyzed: phyogs med kyi mkha' la lding du chug /'bras bu yid bzhin gyi nor bu de //
translated: The wish-fulfilling gem of fruition,

original: re dogs kyi dri ma ma chags shing //
analyzed: re dogs kyi dri ma ma chags shing //
translated: Not attached to the stains of hope and fear,

original: yid smon gyi gling la ma lus par //
analyzed: yid smon gyi gling la ma lus par //
translated: Not remaining on the island of wishful thinking,

original: dgos 'dod kyi gsol ba rem la thob //
analyzed: dgos 'dod kyi gsol ba rem la thob //
translated: Let it obtain the supplication of the desired needs.

original: 'gyur med kyi btsan sa zin nas kyang //
analyzed: 'gyur med kyi btsan sa zin nas kyang //
translated: Having taken up the fortress of changelessness,

original: thugs rje'i 'od zer phyogs med kyi //
analyzed: thugs rje'i 'od zer phyogs med kyi //
translated: The light rays of compassion without direction,

original: 'gro drug gi pha ma byed ba ru //
analyzed: 'gro drug gi pha ma byed ba ru //
translated: The parents of the six beings,

original: sngon dam bcas go cha gon pa de ;
analyzed: sngon dam bcas go cha gon pa de ;
translated: The armor of former vows,

original: / da dus la bab po sa ma y'a //
analyzed: / da dus la bab po sa ma y'a //
translated: Now the time has come, samaya!

original: zhes gsungs te skul ba chen po'i sgra bskal pa'i 'brug bzhin du bsgrags te nam gyi mtha' dang mnyam du mi snang bar dengs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs te skul ba chen po'i sgra bskal pa'i 'brug bzhin du bsgrags te nam gyi mtha' dang mnyam du mi snang bar dengs so //
translated: Thus he sang, and the great sound of encouragement was proclaimed like the thunder of an eon. Then he disappeared into the end of space.

original: mkha' 'gro ma'i 'byam glu ring mo zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma'i 'byam glu ring mo zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
translated: This concludes the long song of the dakinis.
